[close]

/public/themes/admin/js/ -> jquery.dataTables.js (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  /**
   2   * @summary     DataTables
   3   * @description Paginate, search and sort HTML tables
   4   * @version     1.9.0
   5   * @file        jquery.dataTables.js
   6   * @author      Allan Jardine (www.sprymedia.co.uk)
   7   * @contact     www.sprymedia.co.uk/contact
   8   *
   9   * @copyright Copyright 2008-2012 Allan Jardine, all rights reserved.
  10   *
  11   * This source file is free software, under either the GPL v2 license or a
  12   * BSD style license, available at:
  13   *   http://datatables.net/license_gpl2
  14   *   http://datatables.net/license_bsd
  15   * 
  16   * This source file is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but 
  17   * WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY 
  18   * or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the license files for details.
  19   * 
  20   * For details please refer to: http://www.datatables.net
  21   */
  22  
  23  /*jslint evil: true, undef: true, browser: true */
  24  /*globals $, jQuery,_fnExternApiFunc,_fnInitialise,_fnInitComplete,_fnLanguageCompat,_fnAddColumn,_fnColumnOptions,_fnAddData,_fnCreateTr,_fnGatherData,_fnBuildHead,_fnDrawHead,_fnDraw,_fnReDraw,_fnAjaxUpdate,_fnAjaxParameters,_fnAjaxUpdateDraw,_fnServerParams,_fnAddOptionsHtml,_fnFeatureHtmlTable,_fnScrollDraw,_fnAdjustColumnSizing,_fnFeatureHtmlFilter,_fnFilterComplete,_fnFilterCustom,_fnFilterColumn,_fnFilter,_fnBuildSearchArray,_fnBuildSearchRow,_fnFilterCreateSearch,_fnDataToSearch,_fnSort,_fnSortAttachListener,_fnSortingClasses,_fnFeatureHtmlPaginate,_fnPageChange,_fnFeatureHtmlInfo,_fnUpdateInfo,_fnFeatureHtmlLength,_fnFeatureHtmlProcessing,_fnProcessingDisplay,_fnVisibleToColumnIndex,_fnColumnIndexToVisible,_fnNodeToDataIndex,_fnVisbleColumns,_fnCalculateEnd,_fnConvertToWidth,_fnCalculateColumnWidths,_fnScrollingWidthAdjust,_fnGetWidestNode,_fnGetMaxLenString,_fnStringToCss,_fnDetectType,_fnSettingsFromNode,_fnGetDataMaster,_fnGetTrNodes,_fnGetTdNodes,_fnEscapeRegex,_fnDeleteIndex,_fnReOrderIndex,_fnColumnOrdering,_fnLog,_fnClearTable,_fnSaveState,_fnLoadState,_fnCreateCookie,_fnReadCookie,_fnDetectHeader,_fnGetUniqueThs,_fnScrollBarWidth,_fnApplyToChildren,_fnMap,_fnGetRowData,_fnGetCellData,_fnSetCellData,_fnGetObjectDataFn,_fnSetObjectDataFn,_fnApplyColumnDefs,_fnBindAction,_fnCallbackReg,_fnCallbackFire,_fnJsonString,_fnRender,_fnNodeToColumnIndex*/
  25  
  26  (/** @lends <global> */function($, window, document, undefined) {
  27      /** 
  28       * DataTables is a plug-in for the jQuery Javascript library. It is a 
  29       * highly flexible tool, based upon the foundations of progressive 
  30       * enhancement, which will add advanced interaction controls to any 
  31       * HTML table. For a full list of features please refer to
  32       * <a href="http://datatables.net">DataTables.net</a>.
  33       *
  34       * Note that the <i>DataTable</i> object is not a global variable but is
  35       * aliased to <i>jQuery.fn.DataTable</i> and <i>jQuery.fn.dataTable</i> through which 
  36       * it may be  accessed.
  37       *
  38       *  @class
  39       *  @param {object} [oInit={}] Configuration object for DataTables. Options
  40       *    are defined by {@link DataTable.defaults}
  41       *  @requires jQuery 1.3+
  42       * 
  43       *  @example
  44       *    // Basic initialisation
  45       *    $(document).ready( function {
  46       *      $('#example').dataTable();
  47       *    } );
  48       *  
  49       *  @example
  50       *    // Initialisation with configuration options - in this case, disable
  51       *    // pagination and sorting.
  52       *    $(document).ready( function {
  53       *      $('#example').dataTable( {
  54       *        "bPaginate": false,
  55       *        "bSort": false 
  56       *      } );
  57       *    } );
  58       */
  59      var DataTable = function( oInit )
  60      {
  61          
  62          
  63          /**
  64           * Add a column to the list used for the table with default values
  65           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
  66           *  @param {node} nTh The th element for this column
  67           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
  68           */
  69  		function _fnAddColumn( oSettings, nTh )
  70          {
  71              var oDefaults = DataTable.defaults.columns;
  72              var iCol = oSettings.aoColumns.length;
  73              var oCol = $.extend( {}, DataTable.models.oColumn, oDefaults, {
  74                  "sSortingClass": oSettings.oClasses.sSortable,
  75                  "sSortingClassJUI": oSettings.oClasses.sSortJUI,
  76                  "nTh": nTh ? nTh : document.createElement('th'),
  77                  "sTitle":    oDefaults.sTitle    ? oDefaults.sTitle    : nTh ? nTh.innerHTML : '',
  78                  "aDataSort": oDefaults.aDataSort ? oDefaults.aDataSort : [iCol],
  79                  "mDataProp": oDefaults.mDataProp ? oDefaults.oDefaults : iCol,
  80                  "sWrapper": "dataTables_wrapper form-inline"
  81              } );
  82              oSettings.aoColumns.push( oCol );
  83              
  84              /* Add a column specific filter */
  85              if ( oSettings.aoPreSearchCols[ iCol ] === undefined || oSettings.aoPreSearchCols[ iCol ] === null )
  86              {
  87                  oSettings.aoPreSearchCols[ iCol ] = $.extend( {}, DataTable.models.oSearch );
  88              }
  89              else
  90              {
  91                  var oPre = oSettings.aoPreSearchCols[ iCol ];
  92                  
  93                  /* Don't require that the user must specify bRegex, bSmart or bCaseInsensitive */
  94                  if ( oPre.bRegex === undefined )
  95                  {
  96                      oPre.bRegex = true;
  97                  }
  98                  
  99                  if ( oPre.bSmart === undefined )
 100                  {
 101                      oPre.bSmart = true;
 102                  }
 103                  
 104                  if ( oPre.bCaseInsensitive === undefined )
 105                  {
 106                      oPre.bCaseInsensitive = true;
 107                  }
 108              }
 109              
 110              /* Use the column options function to initialise classes etc */
 111              _fnColumnOptions( oSettings, iCol, null );
 112          }
 113          
 114          
 115          /**
 116           * Apply options for a column
 117           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 118           *  @param {int} iCol column index to consider
 119           *  @param {object} oOptions object with sType, bVisible and bSearchable
 120           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 121           */
 122  		function _fnColumnOptions( oSettings, iCol, oOptions )
 123          {
 124              var oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[ iCol ];
 125              
 126              /* User specified column options */
 127              if ( oOptions !== undefined && oOptions !== null )
 128              {
 129                  if ( oOptions.sType !== undefined )
 130                  {
 131                      oCol.sType = oOptions.sType;
 132                      oCol._bAutoType = false;
 133                  }
 134                  
 135                  $.extend( oCol, oOptions );
 136                  _fnMap( oCol, oOptions, "sWidth", "sWidthOrig" );
 137          
 138                  /* iDataSort to be applied (backwards compatibility), but aDataSort will take
 139                   * priority if defined
 140                   */
 141                  if ( oOptions.iDataSort !== undefined )
 142                  {
 143                      oCol.aDataSort = [ oOptions.iDataSort ];
 144                  }
 145                  _fnMap( oCol, oOptions, "aDataSort" );
 146              }
 147          
 148              /* Cache the data get and set functions for speed */
 149              oCol.fnGetData = _fnGetObjectDataFn( oCol.mDataProp );
 150              oCol.fnSetData = _fnSetObjectDataFn( oCol.mDataProp );
 151              
 152              /* Feature sorting overrides column specific when off */
 153              if ( !oSettings.oFeatures.bSort )
 154              {
 155                  oCol.bSortable = false;
 156              }
 157              
 158              /* Check that the class assignment is correct for sorting */
 159              if ( !oCol.bSortable ||
 160                   ($.inArray('asc', oCol.asSorting) == -1 && $.inArray('desc', oCol.asSorting) == -1) )
 161              {
 162                  oCol.sSortingClass = oSettings.oClasses.sSortableNone;
 163                  oCol.sSortingClassJUI = "";
 164              }
 165              else if ( oCol.bSortable ||
 166                        ($.inArray('asc', oCol.asSorting) == -1 && $.inArray('desc', oCol.asSorting) == -1) )
 167              {
 168                oCol.sSortingClass = oSettings.oClasses.sSortable;
 169                oCol.sSortingClassJUI = oSettings.oClasses.sSortJUI;
 170              }
 171              else if ( $.inArray('asc', oCol.asSorting) != -1 && $.inArray('desc', oCol.asSorting) == -1 )
 172              {
 173                  oCol.sSortingClass = oSettings.oClasses.sSortableAsc;
 174                  oCol.sSortingClassJUI = oSettings.oClasses.sSortJUIAscAllowed;
 175              }
 176              else if ( $.inArray('asc', oCol.asSorting) == -1 && $.inArray('desc', oCol.asSorting) != -1 )
 177              {
 178                  oCol.sSortingClass = oSettings.oClasses.sSortableDesc;
 179                  oCol.sSortingClassJUI = oSettings.oClasses.sSortJUIDescAllowed;
 180              }
 181          }
 182          
 183          
 184          /**
 185           * Adjust the table column widths for new data. Note: you would probably want to 
 186           * do a redraw after calling this function!
 187           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 188           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 189           */
 190  		function _fnAdjustColumnSizing ( oSettings )
 191          {
 192              /* Not interested in doing column width calculation if autowidth is disabled */
 193              if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bAutoWidth === false )
 194              {
 195                  return false;
 196              }
 197              
 198              _fnCalculateColumnWidths( oSettings );
 199              for ( var i=0 , iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 200              {
 201                  oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh.style.width = oSettings.aoColumns[i].sWidth;
 202              }
 203          }
 204          
 205          
 206          /**
 207           * Covert the index of a visible column to the index in the data array (take account
 208           * of hidden columns)
 209           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 210           *  @param {int} iMatch Visible column index to lookup
 211           *  @returns {int} i the data index
 212           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 213           */
 214  		function _fnVisibleToColumnIndex( oSettings, iMatch )
 215          {
 216              var iColumn = -1;
 217              
 218              for ( var i=0 ; i<oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i++ )
 219              {
 220                  if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].bVisible === true )
 221                  {
 222                      iColumn++;
 223                  }
 224                  
 225                  if ( iColumn == iMatch )
 226                  {
 227                      return i;
 228                  }
 229              }
 230              
 231              return null;
 232          }
 233          
 234          
 235          /**
 236           * Covert the index of an index in the data array and convert it to the visible
 237           *   column index (take account of hidden columns)
 238           *  @param {int} iMatch Column index to lookup
 239           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 240           *  @returns {int} i the data index
 241           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 242           */
 243  		function _fnColumnIndexToVisible( oSettings, iMatch )
 244          {
 245              var iVisible = -1;
 246              for ( var i=0 ; i<oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i++ )
 247              {
 248                  if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].bVisible === true )
 249                  {
 250                      iVisible++;
 251                  }
 252                  
 253                  if ( i == iMatch )
 254                  {
 255                      return oSettings.aoColumns[i].bVisible === true ? iVisible : null;
 256                  }
 257              }
 258              
 259              return null;
 260          }
 261          
 262          
 263          /**
 264           * Get the number of visible columns
 265           *  @returns {int} i the number of visible columns
 266           *  @param {object} oS dataTables settings object
 267           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 268           */
 269  		function _fnVisbleColumns( oS )
 270          {
 271              var iVis = 0;
 272              for ( var i=0 ; i<oS.aoColumns.length ; i++ )
 273              {
 274                  if ( oS.aoColumns[i].bVisible === true )
 275                  {
 276                      iVis++;
 277                  }
 278              }
 279              return iVis;
 280          }
 281          
 282          
 283          /**
 284           * Get the sort type based on an input string
 285           *  @param {string} sData data we wish to know the type of
 286           *  @returns {string} type (defaults to 'string' if no type can be detected)
 287           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 288           */
 289  		function _fnDetectType( sData )
 290          {
 291              var aTypes = DataTable.ext.aTypes;
 292              var iLen = aTypes.length;
 293              
 294              for ( var i=0 ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 295              {
 296                  var sType = aTypes[i]( sData );
 297                  if ( sType !== null )
 298                  {
 299                      return sType;
 300                  }
 301              }
 302              
 303              return 'string';
 304          }
 305          
 306          
 307          /**
 308           * Figure out how to reorder a display list
 309           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 310           *  @returns array {int} aiReturn index list for reordering
 311           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 312           */
 313  		function _fnReOrderIndex ( oSettings, sColumns )
 314          {
 315              var aColumns = sColumns.split(',');
 316              var aiReturn = [];
 317              
 318              for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 319              {
 320                  for ( var j=0 ; j<iLen ; j++ )
 321                  {
 322                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sName == aColumns[j] )
 323                      {
 324                          aiReturn.push( j );
 325                          break;
 326                      }
 327                  }
 328              }
 329              
 330              return aiReturn;
 331          }
 332          
 333          
 334          /**
 335           * Get the column ordering that DataTables expects
 336           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 337           *  @returns {string} comma separated list of names
 338           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 339           */
 340  		function _fnColumnOrdering ( oSettings )
 341          {
 342              var sNames = '';
 343              for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 344              {
 345                  sNames += oSettings.aoColumns[i].sName+',';
 346              }
 347              if ( sNames.length == iLen )
 348              {
 349                  return "";
 350              }
 351              return sNames.slice(0, -1);
 352          }
 353          
 354          
 355          /**
 356           * Take the column definitions and static columns arrays and calculate how
 357           * they relate to column indexes. The callback function will then apply the
 358           * definition found for a column to a suitable configuration object.
 359           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 360           *  @param {array} aoColDefs The aoColumnDefs array that is to be applied
 361           *  @param {array} aoCols The aoColumns array that defines columns individually
 362           *  @param {function} fn Callback function - takes two parameters, the calculated
 363           *    column index and the definition for that column.
 364           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 365           */
 366  		function _fnApplyColumnDefs( oSettings, aoColDefs, aoCols, fn )
 367          {
 368              var i, iLen, j, jLen, k, kLen;
 369          
 370              // Column definitions with aTargets
 371              if ( aoColDefs )
 372              {
 373                  /* Loop over the definitions array - loop in reverse so first instance has priority */
 374                  for ( i=aoColDefs.length-1 ; i>=0 ; i-- )
 375                  {
 376                      /* Each definition can target multiple columns, as it is an array */
 377                      var aTargets = aoColDefs[i].aTargets;
 378                      if ( !$.isArray( aTargets ) )
 379                      {
 380                          _fnLog( oSettings, 1, 'aTargets must be an array of targets, not a '+(typeof aTargets) );
 381                      }
 382          
 383                      for ( j=0, jLen=aTargets.length ; j<jLen ; j++ )
 384                      {
 385                          if ( typeof aTargets[j] === 'number' && aTargets[j] >= 0 )
 386                          {
 387                              /* Add columns that we don't yet know about */
 388                              while( oSettings.aoColumns.length <= aTargets[j] )
 389                              {
 390                                  _fnAddColumn( oSettings );
 391                              }
 392          
 393                              /* Integer, basic index */
 394                              fn( aTargets[j], aoColDefs[i] );
 395                          }
 396                          else if ( typeof aTargets[j] === 'number' && aTargets[j] < 0 )
 397                          {
 398                              /* Negative integer, right to left column counting */
 399                              fn( oSettings.aoColumns.length+aTargets[j], aoColDefs[i] );
 400                          }
 401                          else if ( typeof aTargets[j] === 'string' )
 402                          {
 403                              /* Class name matching on TH element */
 404                              for ( k=0, kLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; k<kLen ; k++ )
 405                              {
 406                                  if ( aTargets[j] == "_all" ||
 407                                       $(oSettings.aoColumns[k].nTh).hasClass( aTargets[j] ) )
 408                                  {
 409                                      fn( k, aoColDefs[i] );
 410                                  }
 411                              }
 412                          }
 413                      }
 414                  }
 415              }
 416          
 417              // Statically defined columns array
 418              if ( aoCols )
 419              {
 420                  for ( i=0, iLen=aoCols.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 421                  {
 422                      fn( i, aoCols[i] );
 423                  }
 424              }
 425          }
 426          
 427          
 428          
 429          /**
 430           * Add a data array to the table, creating DOM node etc. This is the parallel to 
 431           * _fnGatherData, but for adding rows from a Javascript source, rather than a
 432           * DOM source.
 433           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 434           *  @param {array} aData data array to be added
 435           *  @returns {int} >=0 if successful (index of new aoData entry), -1 if failed
 436           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 437           */
 438  		function _fnAddData ( oSettings, aDataSupplied )
 439          {
 440              var oCol;
 441              
 442              /* Take an independent copy of the data source so we can bash it about as we wish */
 443              var aDataIn = ($.isArray(aDataSupplied)) ?
 444                  aDataSupplied.slice() :
 445                  $.extend( true, {}, aDataSupplied );
 446              
 447              /* Create the object for storing information about this new row */
 448              var iRow = oSettings.aoData.length;
 449              var oData = $.extend( true, {}, DataTable.models.oRow, {
 450                  "_aData": aDataIn
 451              } );
 452              oSettings.aoData.push( oData );
 453          
 454              /* Create the cells */
 455              var nTd, sThisType;
 456              for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 457              {
 458                  oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[i];
 459          
 460                  /* Use rendered data for filtering/sorting */
 461                  if ( typeof oCol.fnRender === 'function' && oCol.bUseRendered && oCol.mDataProp !== null )
 462                  {
 463                      _fnSetCellData( oSettings, iRow, i, _fnRender(oSettings, iRow, i) );
 464                  }
 465                  
 466                  /* See if we should auto-detect the column type */
 467                  if ( oCol._bAutoType && oCol.sType != 'string' )
 468                  {
 469                      /* Attempt to auto detect the type - same as _fnGatherData() */
 470                      var sVarType = _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, i, 'type' );
 471                      if ( sVarType !== null && sVarType !== '' )
 472                      {
 473                          sThisType = _fnDetectType( sVarType );
 474                          if ( oCol.sType === null )
 475                          {
 476                              oCol.sType = sThisType;
 477                          }
 478                          else if ( oCol.sType != sThisType && oCol.sType != "html" )
 479                          {
 480                              /* String is always the 'fallback' option */
 481                              oCol.sType = 'string';
 482                          }
 483                      }
 484                  }
 485              }
 486              
 487              /* Add to the display array */
 488              oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.push( iRow );
 489          
 490              /* Create the DOM imformation */
 491              if ( !oSettings.oFeatures.bDeferRender )
 492              {
 493                  _fnCreateTr( oSettings, iRow );
 494              }
 495          
 496              return iRow;
 497          }
 498          
 499          
 500          /**
 501           * Read in the data from the target table from the DOM
 502           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 503           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 504           */
 505  		function _fnGatherData( oSettings )
 506          {
 507              var iLoop, i, iLen, j, jLen, jInner,
 508                   nTds, nTrs, nTd, aLocalData, iThisIndex,
 509                  iRow, iRows, iColumn, iColumns, sNodeName,
 510                  oCol, oData;
 511              
 512              /*
 513               * Process by row first
 514               * Add the data object for the whole table - storing the tr node. Note - no point in getting
 515               * DOM based data if we are going to go and replace it with Ajax source data.
 516               */
 517              if ( oSettings.bDeferLoading || oSettings.sAjaxSource === null )
 518              {
 519                  nTrs = oSettings.nTBody.childNodes;
 520                  for ( i=0, iLen=nTrs.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 521                  {
 522                      if ( nTrs[i].nodeName.toUpperCase() == "TR" )
 523                      {
 524                          iThisIndex = oSettings.aoData.length;
 525                          nTrs[i]._DT_RowIndex = iThisIndex;
 526                          oSettings.aoData.push( $.extend( true, {}, DataTable.models.oRow, {
 527                              "nTr": nTrs[i]
 528                          } ) );
 529                          
 530                          oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.push( iThisIndex );
 531                          nTds = nTrs[i].childNodes;
 532                          jInner = 0;
 533                          
 534                          for ( j=0, jLen=nTds.length ; j<jLen ; j++ )
 535                          {
 536                              sNodeName = nTds[j].nodeName.toUpperCase();
 537                              if ( sNodeName == "TD" || sNodeName == "TH" )
 538                              {
 539                                  _fnSetCellData( oSettings, iThisIndex, jInner, $.trim(nTds[j].innerHTML) );
 540                                  jInner++;
 541                              }
 542                          }
 543                      }
 544                  }
 545              }
 546              
 547              /* Gather in the TD elements of the Table - note that this is basically the same as
 548               * fnGetTdNodes, but that function takes account of hidden columns, which we haven't yet
 549               * setup!
 550               */
 551              nTrs = _fnGetTrNodes( oSettings );
 552              nTds = [];
 553              for ( i=0, iLen=nTrs.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 554              {
 555                  for ( j=0, jLen=nTrs[i].childNodes.length ; j<jLen ; j++ )
 556                  {
 557                      nTd = nTrs[i].childNodes[j];
 558                      sNodeName = nTd.nodeName.toUpperCase();
 559                      if ( sNodeName == "TD" || sNodeName == "TH" )
 560                      {
 561                          nTds.push( nTd );
 562                      }
 563                  }
 564              }
 565              
 566              /* Now process by column */
 567              for ( iColumn=0, iColumns=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; iColumn<iColumns ; iColumn++ )
 568              {
 569                  oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[iColumn];
 570          
 571                  /* Get the title of the column - unless there is a user set one */
 572                  if ( oCol.sTitle === null )
 573                  {
 574                      oCol.sTitle = oCol.nTh.innerHTML;
 575                  }
 576                  
 577                  var
 578                      bAutoType = oCol._bAutoType,
 579                      bRender = typeof oCol.fnRender === 'function',
 580                      bClass = oCol.sClass !== null,
 581                      bVisible = oCol.bVisible,
 582                      nCell, sThisType, sRendered, sValType;
 583                  
 584                  /* A single loop to rule them all (and be more efficient) */
 585                  if ( bAutoType || bRender || bClass || !bVisible )
 586                  {
 587                      for ( iRow=0, iRows=oSettings.aoData.length ; iRow<iRows ; iRow++ )
 588                      {
 589                          oData = oSettings.aoData[iRow];
 590                          nCell = nTds[ (iRow*iColumns) + iColumn ];
 591                          
 592                          /* Type detection */
 593                          if ( bAutoType && oCol.sType != 'string' )
 594                          {
 595                              sValType = _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iColumn, 'type' );
 596                              if ( sValType !== '' )
 597                              {
 598                                  sThisType = _fnDetectType( sValType );
 599                                  if ( oCol.sType === null )
 600                                  {
 601                                      oCol.sType = sThisType;
 602                                  }
 603                                  else if ( oCol.sType != sThisType && 
 604                                            oCol.sType != "html" )
 605                                  {
 606                                      /* String is always the 'fallback' option */
 607                                      oCol.sType = 'string';
 608                                  }
 609                              }
 610                          }
 611          
 612                          if ( typeof oCol.mDataProp === 'function' )
 613                          {
 614                              nCell.innerHTML = _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iColumn, 'display' );
 615                          }
 616                          
 617                          /* Rendering */
 618                          if ( bRender )
 619                          {
 620                              sRendered = _fnRender( oSettings, iRow, iColumn );
 621                              nCell.innerHTML = sRendered;
 622                              if ( oCol.bUseRendered )
 623                              {
 624                                  /* Use the rendered data for filtering/sorting */
 625                                  _fnSetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iColumn, sRendered );
 626                              }
 627                          }
 628                          
 629                          /* Classes */
 630                          if ( bClass )
 631                          {
 632                              nCell.className += ' '+oCol.sClass;
 633                          }
 634                          
 635                          /* Column visability */
 636                          if ( !bVisible )
 637                          {
 638                              oData._anHidden[iColumn] = nCell;
 639                              nCell.parentNode.removeChild( nCell );
 640                          }
 641                          else
 642                          {
 643                              oData._anHidden[iColumn] = null;
 644                          }
 645          
 646                          if ( oCol.fnCreatedCell )
 647                          {
 648                              oCol.fnCreatedCell.call( oSettings.oInstance,
 649                                  nCell, _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iColumn, 'display' ), oData._aData, iRow, iColumn
 650                              );
 651                          }
 652                      }
 653                  }
 654              }
 655          
 656              /* Row created callbacks */
 657              if ( oSettings.aoRowCreatedCallback.length !== 0 )
 658              {
 659                  for ( i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoData.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 660                  {
 661                      oData = oSettings.aoData[i];
 662                      _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoRowCreatedCallback', null, [oData.nTr, oData._aData, i] );
 663                  }
 664              }
 665          }
 666          
 667          
 668          /**
 669           * Take a TR element and convert it to an index in aoData
 670           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 671           *  @param {node} n the TR element to find
 672           *  @returns {int} index if the node is found, null if not
 673           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 674           */
 675  		function _fnNodeToDataIndex( oSettings, n )
 676          {
 677              return (n._DT_RowIndex!==undefined) ? n._DT_RowIndex : null;
 678          }
 679          
 680          
 681          /**
 682           * Take a TD element and convert it into a column data index (not the visible index)
 683           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 684           *  @param {int} iRow The row number the TD/TH can be found in
 685           *  @param {node} n The TD/TH element to find
 686           *  @returns {int} index if the node is found, -1 if not
 687           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 688           */
 689  		function _fnNodeToColumnIndex( oSettings, iRow, n )
 690          {
 691              var anCells = _fnGetTdNodes( oSettings, iRow );
 692          
 693              for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 694              {
 695                  if ( anCells[i] === n )
 696                  {
 697                      return i;
 698                  }
 699              }
 700              return -1;
 701          }
 702          
 703          
 704          /**
 705           * Get an array of data for a given row from the internal data cache
 706           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 707           *  @param {int} iRow aoData row id
 708           *  @param {string} sSpecific data get type ('type' 'filter' 'sort')
 709           *  @returns {array} Data array
 710           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 711           */
 712  		function _fnGetRowData( oSettings, iRow, sSpecific )
 713          {
 714              var out = [];
 715              for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 716              {
 717                  out.push( _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, i, sSpecific ) );
 718              }
 719              return out;
 720          }
 721          
 722          
 723          /**
 724           * Get the data for a given cell from the internal cache, taking into account data mapping
 725           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 726           *  @param {int} iRow aoData row id
 727           *  @param {int} iCol Column index
 728           *  @param {string} sSpecific data get type ('display', 'type' 'filter' 'sort')
 729           *  @returns {*} Cell data
 730           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 731           */
 732  		function _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iCol, sSpecific )
 733          {
 734              var sData;
 735              var oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[iCol];
 736              var oData = oSettings.aoData[iRow]._aData;
 737          
 738              if ( (sData=oCol.fnGetData( oData, sSpecific )) === undefined )
 739              {
 740                  if ( oSettings.iDrawError != oSettings.iDraw && oCol.sDefaultContent === null )
 741                  {
 742                      _fnLog( oSettings, 0, "Requested unknown parameter '"+oCol.mDataProp+
 743                          "' from the data source for row "+iRow );
 744                      oSettings.iDrawError = oSettings.iDraw;
 745                  }
 746                  return oCol.sDefaultContent;
 747              }
 748          
 749              /* When the data source is null, we can use default column data */
 750              if ( sData === null && oCol.sDefaultContent !== null )
 751              {
 752                  sData = oCol.sDefaultContent;
 753              }
 754              else if ( typeof sData === 'function' )
 755              {
 756                  /* If the data source is a function, then we run it and use the return */
 757                  return sData();
 758              }
 759          
 760              if ( sSpecific == 'display' && sData === null )
 761              {
 762                  return '';
 763              }
 764              return sData;
 765          }
 766          
 767          
 768          /**
 769           * Set the value for a specific cell, into the internal data cache
 770           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 771           *  @param {int} iRow aoData row id
 772           *  @param {int} iCol Column index
 773           *  @param {*} val Value to set
 774           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 775           */
 776  		function _fnSetCellData( oSettings, iRow, iCol, val )
 777          {
 778              var oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[iCol];
 779              var oData = oSettings.aoData[iRow]._aData;
 780          
 781              oCol.fnSetData( oData, val );
 782          }
 783          
 784          
 785          /**
 786           * Return a function that can be used to get data from a source object, taking
 787           * into account the ability to use nested objects as a source
 788           *  @param {string|int|function} mSource The data source for the object
 789           *  @returns {function} Data get function
 790           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 791           */
 792  		function _fnGetObjectDataFn( mSource )
 793          {
 794              if ( mSource === null )
 795              {
 796                  /* Give an empty string for rendering / sorting etc */
 797                  return function (data, type) {
 798                      return null;
 799                  };
 800              }
 801              else if ( typeof mSource === 'function' )
 802              {
 803                  return function (data, type) {
 804                      return mSource( data, type );
 805                  };
 806              }
 807              else if ( typeof mSource === 'string' && mSource.indexOf('.') != -1 )
 808              {
 809                  /* If there is a . in the source string then the data source is in a 
 810                   * nested object so we loop over the data for each level to get the next
 811                   * level down. On each loop we test for undefined, and if found immediatly
 812                   * return. This allows entire objects to be missing and sDefaultContent to
 813                   * be used if defined, rather than throwing an error
 814                   */
 815                  var a = mSource.split('.');
 816                  return function (data, type) {
 817                      for ( var i=0, iLen=a.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 818                      {
 819                          data = data[ a[i] ];
 820                          if ( data === undefined )
 821                          {
 822                              return undefined;
 823                          }
 824                      }
 825                      return data;
 826                  };
 827              }
 828              else
 829              {
 830                  /* Array or flat object mapping */
 831                  return function (data, type) {
 832                      return data[mSource];    
 833                  };
 834              }
 835          }
 836          
 837          
 838          /**
 839           * Return a function that can be used to set data from a source object, taking
 840           * into account the ability to use nested objects as a source
 841           *  @param {string|int|function} mSource The data source for the object
 842           *  @returns {function} Data set function
 843           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 844           */
 845  		function _fnSetObjectDataFn( mSource )
 846          {
 847              if ( mSource === null )
 848              {
 849                  /* Nothing to do when the data source is null */
 850                  return function (data, val) {};
 851              }
 852              else if ( typeof mSource === 'function' )
 853              {
 854                  return function (data, val) {
 855                      mSource( data, 'set', val );
 856                  };
 857              }
 858              else if ( typeof mSource === 'string' && mSource.indexOf('.') != -1 )
 859              {
 860                  /* Like the get, we need to get data from a nested object.  */
 861                  var a = mSource.split('.');
 862                  return function (data, val) {
 863                      for ( var i=0, iLen=a.length-1 ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 864                      {
 865                          data = data[ a[i] ];
 866                      }
 867                      data[ a[a.length-1] ] = val;
 868                  };
 869              }
 870              else
 871              {
 872                  /* Array or flat object mapping */
 873                  return function (data, val) {
 874                      data[mSource] = val;    
 875                  };
 876              }
 877          }
 878          
 879          
 880          /**
 881           * Return an array with the full table data
 882           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 883           *  @returns array {array} aData Master data array
 884           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 885           */
 886  		function _fnGetDataMaster ( oSettings )
 887          {
 888              var aData = [];
 889              var iLen = oSettings.aoData.length;
 890              for ( var i=0 ; i<iLen; i++ )
 891              {
 892                  aData.push( oSettings.aoData[i]._aData );
 893              }
 894              return aData;
 895          }
 896          
 897          
 898          /**
 899           * Nuke the table
 900           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 901           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 902           */
 903  		function _fnClearTable( oSettings )
 904          {
 905              oSettings.aoData.splice( 0, oSettings.aoData.length );
 906              oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.splice( 0, oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.length );
 907              oSettings.aiDisplay.splice( 0, oSettings.aiDisplay.length );
 908              _fnCalculateEnd( oSettings );
 909          }
 910          
 911          
 912           /**
 913           * Take an array of integers (index array) and remove a target integer (value - not 
 914           * the key!)
 915           *  @param {array} a Index array to target
 916           *  @param {int} iTarget value to find
 917           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 918           */
 919  		function _fnDeleteIndex( a, iTarget )
 920          {
 921              var iTargetIndex = -1;
 922              
 923              for ( var i=0, iLen=a.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 924              {
 925                  if ( a[i] == iTarget )
 926                  {
 927                      iTargetIndex = i;
 928                  }
 929                  else if ( a[i] > iTarget )
 930                  {
 931                      a[i]--;
 932                  }
 933              }
 934              
 935              if ( iTargetIndex != -1 )
 936              {
 937                  a.splice( iTargetIndex, 1 );
 938              }
 939          }
 940          
 941          
 942           /**
 943           * Call the developer defined fnRender function for a given cell (row/column) with
 944           * the required parameters and return the result.
 945           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 946           *  @param {int} iRow aoData index for the row
 947           *  @param {int} iCol aoColumns index for the column
 948           *  @returns {*} Return of the developer's fnRender function
 949           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 950           */
 951  		function _fnRender( oSettings, iRow, iCol )
 952          {
 953              var oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[iCol];
 954          
 955              return oCol.fnRender( {
 956                  "iDataRow":    iRow,
 957                  "iDataColumn": iCol,
 958                  "oSettings":   oSettings,
 959                  "aData":       oSettings.aoData[iRow]._aData,
 960                  "mDataProp":   oCol.mDataProp
 961              }, _fnGetCellData(oSettings, iRow, iCol, 'display') );
 962          }
 963          
 964          
 965          /**
 966           * Create a new TR element (and it's TD children) for a row
 967           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
 968           *  @param {int} iRow Row to consider
 969           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
 970           */
 971  		function _fnCreateTr ( oSettings, iRow )
 972          {
 973              var oData = oSettings.aoData[iRow];
 974              var nTd;
 975          
 976              if ( oData.nTr === null )
 977              {
 978                  oData.nTr = document.createElement('tr');
 979          
 980                  /* Use a private property on the node to allow reserve mapping from the node
 981                   * to the aoData array for fast look up
 982                   */
 983                  oData.nTr._DT_RowIndex = iRow;
 984          
 985                  /* Special parameters can be given by the data source to be used on the row */
 986                  if ( oData._aData.DT_RowId )
 987                  {
 988                      oData.nTr.id = oData._aData.DT_RowId;
 989                  }
 990          
 991                  if ( oData._aData.DT_RowClass )
 992                  {
 993                      $(oData.nTr).addClass( oData._aData.DT_RowClass );
 994                  }
 995          
 996                  /* Process each column */
 997                  for ( var i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
 998                  {
 999                      var oCol = oSettings.aoColumns[i];
1000                      nTd = document.createElement('td');
1001          
1002                      /* Render if needed - if bUseRendered is true then we already have the rendered
1003                       * value in the data source - so can just use that
1004                       */
1005                      nTd.innerHTML = (typeof oCol.fnRender === 'function' && (!oCol.bUseRendered || oCol.mDataProp === null)) ?
1006                          _fnRender( oSettings, iRow, i ) :
1007                          _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, i, 'display' );
1008                  
1009                      /* Add user defined class */
1010                      if ( oCol.sClass !== null )
1011                      {
1012                          nTd.className = oCol.sClass;
1013                      }
1014                      
1015                      if ( oCol.bVisible )
1016                      {
1017                          oData.nTr.appendChild( nTd );
1018                          oData._anHidden[i] = null;
1019                      }
1020                      else
1021                      {
1022                          oData._anHidden[i] = nTd;
1023                      }
1024          
1025                      if ( oCol.fnCreatedCell )
1026                      {
1027                          oCol.fnCreatedCell.call( oSettings.oInstance,
1028                              nTd, _fnGetCellData( oSettings, iRow, i, 'display' ), oData._aData, iRow, i
1029                          );
1030                      }
1031                  }
1032          
1033                  _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoRowCreatedCallback', null, [oData.nTr, oData._aData, iRow] );
1034              }
1035          }
1036          
1037          
1038          /**
1039           * Create the HTML header for the table
1040           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
1041           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1042           */
1043  		function _fnBuildHead( oSettings )
1044          {
1045              var i, nTh, iLen, j, jLen;
1046              var iThs = oSettings.nTHead.getElementsByTagName('th').length;
1047              var iCorrector = 0;
1048              var jqChildren;
1049              
1050              /* If there is a header in place - then use it - otherwise it's going to get nuked... */
1051              if ( iThs !== 0 )
1052              {
1053                  /* We've got a thead from the DOM, so remove hidden columns and apply width to vis cols */
1054                  for ( i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1055                  {
1056                      nTh = oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh;
1057                      nTh.setAttribute('role', 'columnheader');
1058                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].bSortable )
1059                      {
1060                          nTh.setAttribute('tabindex', oSettings.iTabIndex);
1061                          nTh.setAttribute('aria-controls', oSettings.sTableId);
1062                      }
1063          
1064                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass !== null )
1065                      {
1066                          $(nTh).addClass( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass );
1067                      }
1068                      
1069                      /* Set the title of the column if it is user defined (not what was auto detected) */
1070                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sTitle != nTh.innerHTML )
1071                      {
1072                          nTh.innerHTML = oSettings.aoColumns[i].sTitle;
1073                      }
1074                  }
1075              }
1076              else
1077              {
1078                  /* We don't have a header in the DOM - so we are going to have to create one */
1079                  var nTr = document.createElement( "tr" );
1080                  
1081                  for ( i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1082                  {
1083                      nTh = oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh;
1084                      nTh.innerHTML = oSettings.aoColumns[i].sTitle;
1085                      nTh.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');
1086                      
1087                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass !== null )
1088                      {
1089                          $(nTh).addClass( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass );
1090                      }
1091                      
1092                      nTr.appendChild( nTh );
1093                  }
1094                  $(oSettings.nTHead).html( '' )[0].appendChild( nTr );
1095                  _fnDetectHeader( oSettings.aoHeader, oSettings.nTHead );
1096              }
1097              
1098              /* ARIA role for the rows */    
1099              $(oSettings.nTHead).children('tr').attr('role', 'row');
1100              
1101              /* Add the extra markup needed by jQuery UI's themes */
1102              if ( oSettings.bJUI )
1103              {
1104                  for ( i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1105                  {
1106                      nTh = oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh;
1107                      
1108                      var nDiv = document.createElement('div');
1109                      nDiv.className = oSettings.oClasses.sSortJUIWrapper;
1110                      $(nTh).contents().appendTo(nDiv);
1111                      
1112                      var nSpan = document.createElement('span');
1113                      nSpan.className = oSettings.oClasses.sSortIcon;
1114                      nDiv.appendChild( nSpan );
1115                      nTh.appendChild( nDiv );
1116                  }
1117              }
1118              
1119              if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bSort )
1120              {
1121                  for ( i=0 ; i<oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i++ )
1122                  {
1123                      if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].bSortable !== false )
1124                      {
1125                          _fnSortAttachListener( oSettings, oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh, i );
1126                      }
1127                      else
1128                      {
1129                          $(oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTh).addClass( oSettings.oClasses.sSortableNone );
1130                      }
1131                  }
1132              }
1133              
1134              /* Deal with the footer - add classes if required */
1135              if ( oSettings.oClasses.sFooterTH !== "" )
1136              {
1137                  $(oSettings.nTFoot).children('tr').children('th').addClass( oSettings.oClasses.sFooterTH );
1138              }
1139              
1140              /* Cache the footer elements */
1141              if ( oSettings.nTFoot !== null )
1142              {
1143                  var anCells = _fnGetUniqueThs( oSettings, null, oSettings.aoFooter );
1144                  for ( i=0, iLen=oSettings.aoColumns.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1145                  {
1146                      if ( anCells[i] )
1147                      {
1148                          oSettings.aoColumns[i].nTf = anCells[i];
1149                          if ( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass )
1150                          {
1151                              $(anCells[i]).addClass( oSettings.aoColumns[i].sClass );
1152                          }
1153                      }
1154                  }
1155              }
1156          }
1157          
1158          
1159          /**
1160           * Draw the header (or footer) element based on the column visibility states. The
1161           * methodology here is to use the layout array from _fnDetectHeader, modified for
1162           * the instantaneous column visibility, to construct the new layout. The grid is
1163           * traversed over cell at a time in a rows x columns grid fashion, although each 
1164           * cell insert can cover multiple elements in the grid - which is tracks using the
1165           * aApplied array. Cell inserts in the grid will only occur where there isn't
1166           * already a cell in that position.
1167           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
1168           *  @param array {objects} aoSource Layout array from _fnDetectHeader
1169           *  @param {boolean} [bIncludeHidden=false] If true then include the hidden columns in the calc, 
1170           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1171           */
1172  		function _fnDrawHead( oSettings, aoSource, bIncludeHidden )
1173          {
1174              var i, iLen, j, jLen, k, kLen, n, nLocalTr;
1175              var aoLocal = [];
1176              var aApplied = [];
1177              var iColumns = oSettings.aoColumns.length;
1178              var iRowspan, iColspan;
1179          
1180              if (  bIncludeHidden === undefined )
1181              {
1182                  bIncludeHidden = false;
1183              }
1184          
1185              /* Make a copy of the master layout array, but without the visible columns in it */
1186              for ( i=0, iLen=aoSource.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1187              {
1188                  aoLocal[i] = aoSource[i].slice();
1189                  aoLocal[i].nTr = aoSource[i].nTr;
1190          
1191                  /* Remove any columns which are currently hidden */
1192                  for ( j=iColumns-1 ; j>=0 ; j-- )
1193                  {
1194                      if ( !oSettings.aoColumns[j].bVisible && !bIncludeHidden )
1195                      {
1196                          aoLocal[i].splice( j, 1 );
1197                      }
1198                  }
1199          
1200                  /* Prep the applied array - it needs an element for each row */
1201                  aApplied.push( [] );
1202              }
1203          
1204              for ( i=0, iLen=aoLocal.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1205              {
1206                  nLocalTr = aoLocal[i].nTr;
1207                  
1208                  /* All cells are going to be replaced, so empty out the row */
1209                  if ( nLocalTr )
1210                  {
1211                      while( (n = nLocalTr.firstChild) )
1212                      {
1213                          nLocalTr.removeChild( n );
1214                      }
1215                  }
1216          
1217                  for ( j=0, jLen=aoLocal[i].length ; j<jLen ; j++ )
1218                  {
1219                      iRowspan = 1;
1220                      iColspan = 1;
1221          
1222                      /* Check to see if there is already a cell (row/colspan) covering our target
1223                       * insert point. If there is, then there is nothing to do.
1224                       */
1225                      if ( aApplied[i][j] === undefined )
1226                      {
1227                          nLocalTr.appendChild( aoLocal[i][j].cell );
1228                          aApplied[i][j] = 1;
1229          
1230                          /* Expand the cell to cover as many rows as needed */
1231                          while ( aoLocal[i+iRowspan] !== undefined &&
1232                                  aoLocal[i][j].cell == aoLocal[i+iRowspan][j].cell )
1233                          {
1234                              aApplied[i+iRowspan][j] = 1;
1235                              iRowspan++;
1236                          }
1237          
1238                          /* Expand the cell to cover as many columns as needed */
1239                          while ( aoLocal[i][j+iColspan] !== undefined &&
1240                                  aoLocal[i][j].cell == aoLocal[i][j+iColspan].cell )
1241                          {
1242                              /* Must update the applied array over the rows for the columns */
1243                              for ( k=0 ; k<iRowspan ; k++ )
1244                              {
1245                                  aApplied[i+k][j+iColspan] = 1;
1246                              }
1247                              iColspan++;
1248                          }
1249          
1250                          /* Do the actual expansion in the DOM */
1251                          aoLocal[i][j].cell.rowSpan = iRowspan;
1252                          aoLocal[i][j].cell.colSpan = iColspan;
1253                      }
1254                  }
1255              }
1256          }
1257          
1258          
1259          /**
1260           * Insert the required TR nodes into the table for display
1261           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
1262           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1263           */
1264  		function _fnDraw( oSettings )
1265          {
1266              var i, iLen, n;
1267              var anRows = [];
1268              var iRowCount = 0;
1269              var iStripes = oSettings.asStripeClasses.length;
1270              var iOpenRows = oSettings.aoOpenRows.length;
1271              
1272              /* Provide a pre-callback function which can be used to cancel the draw is false is returned */
1273              var aPreDraw = _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoPreDrawCallback', 'preDraw', [oSettings] );
1274              if ( $.inArray( false, aPreDraw ) !== -1 )
1275              {
1276                  return;
1277              }
1278              
1279              oSettings.bDrawing = true;
1280              
1281              /* Check and see if we have an initial draw position from state saving */
1282              if ( oSettings.iInitDisplayStart !== undefined && oSettings.iInitDisplayStart != -1 )
1283              {
1284                  if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide )
1285                  {
1286                      oSettings._iDisplayStart = oSettings.iInitDisplayStart;
1287                  }
1288                  else
1289                  {
1290                      oSettings._iDisplayStart = (oSettings.iInitDisplayStart >= oSettings.fnRecordsDisplay()) ?
1291                          0 : oSettings.iInitDisplayStart;
1292                  }
1293                  oSettings.iInitDisplayStart = -1;
1294                  _fnCalculateEnd( oSettings );
1295              }
1296              
1297              /* Server-side processing draw intercept */
1298              if ( oSettings.bDeferLoading )
1299              {
1300                  oSettings.bDeferLoading = false;
1301                  oSettings.iDraw++;
1302              }
1303              else if ( !oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide )
1304              {
1305                  oSettings.iDraw++;
1306              }
1307              else if ( !oSettings.bDestroying && !_fnAjaxUpdate( oSettings ) )
1308              {
1309                  return;
1310              }
1311              
1312              if ( oSettings.aiDisplay.length !== 0 )
1313              {
1314                  var iStart = oSettings._iDisplayStart;
1315                  var iEnd = oSettings._iDisplayEnd;
1316                  
1317                  if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide )
1318                  {
1319                      iStart = 0;
1320                      iEnd = oSettings.aoData.length;
1321                  }
1322                  
1323                  for ( var j=iStart ; j<iEnd ; j++ )
1324                  {
1325                      var aoData = oSettings.aoData[ oSettings.aiDisplay[j] ];
1326                      if ( aoData.nTr === null )
1327                      {
1328                          _fnCreateTr( oSettings, oSettings.aiDisplay[j] );
1329                      }
1330          
1331                      var nRow = aoData.nTr;
1332                      
1333                      /* Remove the old striping classes and then add the new one */
1334                      if ( iStripes !== 0 )
1335                      {
1336                          var sStripe = oSettings.asStripeClasses[ iRowCount % iStripes ];
1337                          if ( aoData._sRowStripe != sStripe )
1338                          {
1339                              $(nRow).removeClass( aoData._sRowStripe ).addClass( sStripe );
1340                              aoData._sRowStripe = sStripe;
1341                          }
1342                      }
1343                      
1344                      /* Row callback functions - might want to manipule the row */
1345                      _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoRowCallback', null, 
1346                          [nRow, oSettings.aoData[ oSettings.aiDisplay[j] ]._aData, iRowCount, j] );
1347                      
1348                      anRows.push( nRow );
1349                      iRowCount++;
1350                      
1351                      /* If there is an open row - and it is attached to this parent - attach it on redraw */
1352                      if ( iOpenRows !== 0 )
1353                      {
1354                          for ( var k=0 ; k<iOpenRows ; k++ )
1355                          {
1356                              if ( nRow == oSettings.aoOpenRows[k].nParent )
1357                              {
1358                                  anRows.push( oSettings.aoOpenRows[k].nTr );
1359                                  break;
1360                              }
1361                          }
1362                      }
1363                  }
1364              }
1365              else
1366              {
1367                  /* Table is empty - create a row with an empty message in it */
1368                  anRows[ 0 ] = document.createElement( 'tr' );
1369                  
1370                  if ( oSettings.asStripeClasses[0] )
1371                  {
1372                      anRows[ 0 ].className = oSettings.asStripeClasses[0];
1373                  }
1374          
1375                  var sZero = oSettings.oLanguage.sZeroRecords.replace(
1376                      '_MAX_', oSettings.fnFormatNumber(oSettings.fnRecordsTotal()) );
1377                  if ( oSettings.iDraw == 1 && oSettings.sAjaxSource !== null && !oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide )
1378                  {
1379                      sZero = oSettings.oLanguage.sLoadingRecords;
1380                  }
1381                  else if ( oSettings.oLanguage.sEmptyTable && oSettings.fnRecordsTotal() === 0 )
1382                  {
1383                      sZero = oSettings.oLanguage.sEmptyTable;
1384                  }
1385          
1386                  var nTd = document.createElement( 'td' );
1387                  nTd.setAttribute( 'valign', "top" );
1388                  nTd.colSpan = _fnVisbleColumns( oSettings );
1389                  nTd.className = oSettings.oClasses.sRowEmpty;
1390                  nTd.innerHTML = sZero;
1391                  
1392                  anRows[ iRowCount ].appendChild( nTd );
1393              }
1394              
1395              /* Header and footer callbacks */
1396              _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoHeaderCallback', 'header', [ $(oSettings.nTHead).children('tr')[0], 
1397                  _fnGetDataMaster( oSettings ), oSettings._iDisplayStart, oSettings.fnDisplayEnd(), oSettings.aiDisplay ] );
1398              
1399              _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoFooterCallback', 'footer', [ $(oSettings.nTFoot).children('tr')[0], 
1400                  _fnGetDataMaster( oSettings ), oSettings._iDisplayStart, oSettings.fnDisplayEnd(), oSettings.aiDisplay ] );
1401              
1402              /* 
1403               * Need to remove any old row from the display - note we can't just empty the tbody using
1404               * $().html('') since this will unbind the jQuery event handlers (even although the node 
1405               * still exists!) - equally we can't use innerHTML, since IE throws an exception.
1406               */
1407              var
1408                  nAddFrag = document.createDocumentFragment(),
1409                  nRemoveFrag = document.createDocumentFragment(),
1410                  nBodyPar, nTrs;
1411              
1412              if ( oSettings.nTBody )
1413              {
1414                  nBodyPar = oSettings.nTBody.parentNode;
1415                  nRemoveFrag.appendChild( oSettings.nTBody );
1416                  
1417                  /* When doing infinite scrolling, only remove child rows when sorting, filtering or start
1418                   * up. When not infinite scroll, always do it.
1419                   */
1420                  if ( !oSettings.oScroll.bInfinite || !oSettings._bInitComplete ||
1421                       oSettings.bSorted || oSettings.bFiltered )
1422                  {
1423                      while( (n = oSettings.nTBody.firstChild) )
1424                      {
1425                          oSettings.nTBody.removeChild( n );
1426                      }
1427                  }
1428                  
1429                  /* Put the draw table into the dom */
1430                  for ( i=0, iLen=anRows.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1431                  {
1432                      nAddFrag.appendChild( anRows[i] );
1433                  }
1434                  
1435                  oSettings.nTBody.appendChild( nAddFrag );
1436                  if ( nBodyPar !== null )
1437                  {
1438                      nBodyPar.appendChild( oSettings.nTBody );
1439                  }
1440              }
1441              
1442              /* Call all required callback functions for the end of a draw */
1443              _fnCallbackFire( oSettings, 'aoDrawCallback', 'draw', [oSettings] );
1444              
1445              /* Draw is complete, sorting and filtering must be as well */
1446              oSettings.bSorted = false;
1447              oSettings.bFiltered = false;
1448              oSettings.bDrawing = false;
1449              
1450              if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide )
1451              {
1452                  _fnProcessingDisplay( oSettings, false );
1453                  if ( !oSettings._bInitComplete )
1454                  {
1455                      _fnInitComplete( oSettings );
1456                  }
1457              }
1458          }
1459          
1460          
1461          /**
1462           * Redraw the table - taking account of the various features which are enabled
1463           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
1464           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1465           */
1466  		function _fnReDraw( oSettings )
1467          {
1468              if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bSort )
1469              {
1470                  /* Sorting will refilter and draw for us */
1471                  _fnSort( oSettings, oSettings.oPreviousSearch );
1472              }
1473              else if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bFilter )
1474              {
1475                  /* Filtering will redraw for us */
1476                  _fnFilterComplete( oSettings, oSettings.oPreviousSearch );
1477              }
1478              else
1479              {
1480                  _fnCalculateEnd( oSettings );
1481                  _fnDraw( oSettings );
1482              }
1483          }
1484          
1485          
1486          /**
1487           * Add the options to the page HTML for the table
1488           *  @param {object} oSettings dataTables settings object
1489           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1490           */
1491  		function _fnAddOptionsHtml ( oSettings )
1492          {
1493              /*
1494               * Create a temporary, empty, div which we can later on replace with what we have generated
1495               * we do it this way to rendering the 'options' html offline - speed :-)
1496               */
1497              var nHolding = $('<div></div>')[0];
1498              oSettings.nTable.parentNode.insertBefore( nHolding, oSettings.nTable );
1499              
1500              /* 
1501               * All DataTables are wrapped in a div
1502               */
1503              oSettings.nTableWrapper = $('<div id="'+oSettings.sTableId+'_wrapper" class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sWrapper+'" role="grid"></div>')[0];
1504              oSettings.nTableReinsertBefore = oSettings.nTable.nextSibling;
1505          
1506              /* Track where we want to insert the option */
1507              var nInsertNode = oSettings.nTableWrapper;
1508              
1509              /* Loop over the user set positioning and place the elements as needed */
1510              var aDom = oSettings.sDom.split('');
1511              var nTmp, iPushFeature, cOption, nNewNode, cNext, sAttr, j;
1512              for ( var i=0 ; i<aDom.length ; i++ )
1513              {
1514                  iPushFeature = 0;
1515                  cOption = aDom[i];
1516                  
1517                  if ( cOption == '<' )
1518                  {
1519                      /* New container div */
1520                      nNewNode = $('<div></div>')[0];
1521                      
1522                      /* Check to see if we should append an id and/or a class name to the container */
1523                      cNext = aDom[i+1];
1524                      if ( cNext == "'" || cNext == '"' )
1525                      {
1526                          sAttr = "";
1527                          j = 2;
1528                          while ( aDom[i+j] != cNext )
1529                          {
1530                              sAttr += aDom[i+j];
1531                              j++;
1532                          }
1533                          
1534                          /* Replace jQuery UI constants */
1535                          if ( sAttr == "H" )
1536                          {
1537                              sAttr = "fg-toolbar ui-toolbar ui-widget-header ui-corner-tl ui-corner-tr ui-helper-clearfix";
1538                          }
1539                          else if ( sAttr == "F" )
1540                          {
1541                              sAttr = "fg-toolbar ui-toolbar ui-widget-header ui-corner-bl ui-corner-br ui-helper-clearfix";
1542                          }
1543                          
1544                          /* The attribute can be in the format of "#id.class", "#id" or "class" This logic
1545                           * breaks the string into parts and applies them as needed
1546                           */
1547                          if ( sAttr.indexOf('.') != -1 )
1548                          {
1549                              var aSplit = sAttr.split('.');
1550                              nNewNode.id = aSplit[0].substr(1, aSplit[0].length-1);
1551                              nNewNode.className = aSplit[1];
1552                          }
1553                          else if ( sAttr.charAt(0) == "#" )
1554                          {
1555                              nNewNode.id = sAttr.substr(1, sAttr.length-1);
1556                          }
1557                          else
1558                          {
1559                              nNewNode.className = sAttr;
1560                          }
1561                          
1562                          i += j; /* Move along the position array */
1563                      }
1564                      
1565                      nInsertNode.appendChild( nNewNode );
1566                      nInsertNode = nNewNode;
1567                  }
1568                  else if ( cOption == '>' )
1569                  {
1570                      /* End container div */
1571                      nInsertNode = nInsertNode.parentNode;
1572                  }
1573                  else if ( cOption == 'l' && oSettings.oFeatures.bPaginate && oSettings.oFeatures.bLengthChange )
1574                  {
1575                      /* Length */
1576                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlLength( oSettings );
1577                      iPushFeature = 1;
1578                  }
1579                  else if ( cOption == 'f' && oSettings.oFeatures.bFilter )
1580                  {
1581                      /* Filter */
1582                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlFilter( oSettings );
1583                      iPushFeature = 1;
1584                  }
1585                  else if ( cOption == 'r' && oSettings.oFeatures.bProcessing )
1586                  {
1587                      /* pRocessing */
1588                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlProcessing( oSettings );
1589                      iPushFeature = 1;
1590                  }
1591                  else if ( cOption == 't' )
1592                  {
1593                      /* Table */
1594                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlTable( oSettings );
1595                      iPushFeature = 1;
1596                  }
1597                  else if ( cOption ==  'i' && oSettings.oFeatures.bInfo )
1598                  {
1599                      /* Info */
1600                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlInfo( oSettings );
1601                      iPushFeature = 1;
1602                  }
1603                  else if ( cOption == 'p' && oSettings.oFeatures.bPaginate )
1604                  {
1605                      /* Pagination */
1606                      nTmp = _fnFeatureHtmlPaginate( oSettings );
1607                      iPushFeature = 1;
1608                  }
1609                  else if ( DataTable.ext.aoFeatures.length !== 0 )
1610                  {
1611                      /* Plug-in features */
1612                      var aoFeatures = DataTable.ext.aoFeatures;
1613                      for ( var k=0, kLen=aoFeatures.length ; k<kLen ; k++ )
1614                      {
1615                          if ( cOption == aoFeatures[k].cFeature )
1616                          {
1617                              nTmp = aoFeatures[k].fnInit( oSettings );
1618                              if ( nTmp )
1619                              {
1620                                  iPushFeature = 1;
1621                              }
1622                              break;
1623                          }
1624                      }
1625                  }
1626                  
1627                  /* Add to the 2D features array */
1628                  if ( iPushFeature == 1 && nTmp !== null )
1629                  {
1630                      if ( typeof oSettings.aanFeatures[cOption] !== 'object' )
1631                      {
1632                          oSettings.aanFeatures[cOption] = [];
1633                      }
1634                      oSettings.aanFeatures[cOption].push( nTmp );
1635                      nInsertNode.appendChild( nTmp );
1636                  }
1637              }
1638              
1639              /* Built our DOM structure - replace the holding div with what we want */
1640              nHolding.parentNode.replaceChild( oSettings.nTableWrapper, nHolding );
1641          }
1642          
1643          
1644          /**
1645           * Use the DOM source to create up an array of header cells. The idea here is to
1646           * create a layout grid (array) of rows x columns, which contains a reference
1647           * to the cell that that point in the grid (regardless of col/rowspan), such that
1648           * any column / row could be removed and the new grid constructed
1649           *  @param array {object} aLayout Array to store the calculated layout in
1650           *  @param {node} nThead The header/footer element for the table
1651           *  @memberof DataTable#oApi
1652           */
1653  		function _fnDetectHeader ( aLayout, nThead )
1654          {
1655              var nTrs = $(nThead).children('tr');
1656              var nCell;
1657              var i, j, k, l, iLen, jLen, iColShifted;
1658              var fnShiftCol = function ( a, i, j ) {
1659                  while ( a[i][j] ) {
1660                      j++;
1661                  }
1662                  return j;
1663              };
1664          
1665              aLayout.splice( 0, aLayout.length );
1666              
1667              /* We know how many rows there are in the layout - so prep it */
1668              for ( i=0, iLen=nTrs.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1669              {
1670                  aLayout.push( [] );
1671              }
1672              
1673              /* Calculate a layout array */
1674              for ( i=0, iLen=nTrs.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
1675              {
1676                  var iColumn = 0;
1677                  
1678                  /* For every cell in the row... */
1679                  for ( j=0, jLen=nTrs[i].childNodes.length ; j<jLen ; j++ )
1680                  {
1681                      nCell = nTrs[i].childNodes[j];
1682          
1683                      if ( nCell.nodeName.toUpperCase() == "TD" ||
1684                           nCell.nodeName.toUpperCase() == "TH" )
1685                      {
1686                          /* Get the col and rowspan attributes from the DOM and sanitise them */
1687                          var iColspan = nCell.getAttribute('colspan') * 1;
1688                          var iRowspan = nCell.getAttribute('rowspan') * 1;
1689                          iColspan = (!iColspan || iColspan===0 || iColspan===1) ? 1 : iColspan;
1690                          iRowspan = (!iRowspan || iRowspan===0 || iRowspan===1) ? 1 : iRowspan;
1691          
1692                          /* There might be colspan cells already in this row, so shift our target 
1693                           * accordingly
1694                           */
1695                          iColShifted = fnShiftCol( aLayout, i, iColumn );
1696                          
1697                          /* If there is col / rowspan, copy the information into the layout grid */
1698                          for ( l=0 ; l<iColspan ; l++ )
1699                          {
1700                              for ( k=0 ; k<iRowspan ; k++ )
1701                              {
1702                                  aLayout[i+k][iColShifted+l] = {
1703                                      "cell": nCell,
1704                                      "unique": iColspan == 1 ? true : false
1705                                  };
1706                                  aLayout[i+k].nTr = nTrs[i];
1707                              }
1708                          }
1709                      }
