10364          "aiDisplay": [],
10365          
10366          /**
10367           * Array of indexes for display - no filtering
10368           *  @type array
10369           *  @default []
10370           */
10371          "aiDisplayMaster": [],
10372          
10373          /**
10374           * Store information about each column that is in use
10375           *  @type array
10376           *  @default []
10377           */
10378          "aoColumns": [],
10379          
10380          /**
10381           * Store information about the table's header
10382           *  @type array
10383           *  @default []
10384           */
10385          "aoHeader": [],
10386          
10387          /**
10388           * Store information about the table's footer
10389           *  @type array
10390           *  @default []
10391           */
10392          "aoFooter": [],
10393          
10394          /**
10395           * Search data array for regular expression searching
10396           *  @type array
10397           *  @default []
10398           */
10399          "asDataSearch": [],
10400          
10401          /**
10402           * Store the applied global search information in case we want to force a 
10403           * research or compare the old search to a new one.
10404           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10405           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10406           *  @namespace
10407           *  @extends DataTable.models.oSearch
10408           */
10409          "oPreviousSearch": {},
10410          
10411          /**
10412           * Store the applied search for each column - see 
10413           * {@link DataTable.models.oSearch} for the format that is used for the
10414           * filtering information for each column.
10415           *  @type array
10416           *  @default []
10417           */
10418          "aoPreSearchCols": [],
10419          
10420          /**
10421           * Sorting that is applied to the table. Note that the inner arrays are
10422           * used in the following manner:
10423           * <ul>
10424           *   <li>Index 0 - column number</li>
10425           *   <li>Index 1 - current sorting direction</li>
10426           *   <li>Index 2 - index of asSorting for this column</li>
10427           * </ul>
10428           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10429           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10430           *  @type array
10431           *  @todo These inner arrays should really be objects
10432           */
10433          "aaSorting": null,
10434          
10435          /**
10436           * Sorting that is always applied to the table (i.e. prefixed in front of
10437           * aaSorting).
10438           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10439           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10440           *  @type array|null
10441           *  @default null
10442           */
10443          "aaSortingFixed": null,
10444          
10445          /**
10446           * Classes to use for the striping of a table.
10447           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10448           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10449           *  @type array
10450           *  @default []
10451           */
10452          "asStripeClasses": null,
10453          
10454          /**
10455           * If restoring a table - we should restore its striping classes as well
10456           *  @type array
10457           *  @default []
10458           */
10459          "asDestroyStripes": [],
10460          
10461          /**
10462           * If restoring a table - we should restore its width 
10463           *  @type int
10464           *  @default 0
10465           */
10466          "sDestroyWidth": 0,
10467          
10468          /**
10469           * Callback functions array for every time a row is inserted (i.e. on a draw).
10470           *  @type array
10471           *  @default []
10472           */
10473          "aoRowCallback": [],
10474          
10475          /**
10476           * Callback functions for the header on each draw.
10477           *  @type array
10478           *  @default []
10479           */
10480          "aoHeaderCallback": [],
10481          
10482          /**
10483           * Callback function for the footer on each draw.
10484           *  @type array
10485           *  @default []
10486           */
10487          "aoFooterCallback": [],
10488          
10489          /**
10490           * Array of callback functions for draw callback functions
10491           *  @type array
10492           *  @default []
10493           */
10494          "aoDrawCallback": [],
10495          
10496          /**
10497           * Array of callback functions for row created function
10498           *  @type array
10499           *  @default []
10500           */
10501          "aoRowCreatedCallback": [],
10502          
10503          /**
10504           * Callback functions for just before the table is redrawn. A return of 
10505           * false will be used to cancel the draw.
10506           *  @type array
10507           *  @default []
10508           */
10509          "aoPreDrawCallback": [],
10510          
10511          /**
10512           * Callback functions for when the table has been initialised.
10513           *  @type array
10514           *  @default []
10515           */
10516          "aoInitComplete": [],
10517      
10518          
10519          /**
10520           * Callbacks for modifying the settings to be stored for state saving, prior to
10521           * saving state.
10522           *  @type array
10523           *  @default []
10524           */
10525          "aoStateSaveParams": [],
10526          
10527          /**
10528           * Callbacks for modifying the settings that have been stored for state saving
10529           * prior to using the stored values to restore the state.
10530           *  @type array
10531           *  @default []
10532           */
10533          "aoStateLoadParams": [],
10534          
10535          /**
10536           * Callbacks for operating on the settings object once the saved state has been
10537           * loaded
10538           *  @type array
10539           *  @default []
10540           */
10541          "aoStateLoaded": [],
10542          
10543          /**
10544           * Cache the table ID for quick access
10545           *  @type string
10546           *  @default <i>Empty string</i>
10547           */
10548          "sTableId": "",
10549          
10550          /**
10551           * The TABLE node for the main table
10552           *  @type node
10553           *  @default null
10554           */
10555          "nTable": null,
10556          
10557          /**
10558           * Permanent ref to the thead element
10559           *  @type node
10560           *  @default null
10561           */
10562          "nTHead": null,
10563          
10564          /**
10565           * Permanent ref to the tfoot element - if it exists
10566           *  @type node
10567           *  @default null
10568           */
10569          "nTFoot": null,
10570          
10571          /**
10572           * Permanent ref to the tbody element
10573           *  @type node
10574           *  @default null
10575           */
10576          "nTBody": null,
10577          
10578          /**
10579           * Cache the wrapper node (contains all DataTables controlled elements)
10580           *  @type node
10581           *  @default null
10582           */
10583          "nTableWrapper": null,
10584          
10585          /**
10586           * Indicate if when using server-side processing the loading of data 
10587           * should be deferred until the second draw.
10588           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10589           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10590           *  @type boolean
10591           *  @default false
10592           */
10593          "bDeferLoading": false,
10594          
10595          /**
10596           * Indicate if all required information has been read in
10597           *  @type boolean
10598           *  @default false
10599           */
10600          "bInitialised": false,
10601          
10602          /**
10603           * Information about open rows. Each object in the array has the parameters
10604           * 'nTr' and 'nParent'
10605           *  @type array
10606           *  @default []
10607           */
10608          "aoOpenRows": [],
10609          
10610          /**
10611           * Dictate the positioning of DataTables' control elements - see
10612           * {@link DataTable.model.oInit.sDom}.
10613           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10614           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10615           *  @type string
10616           *  @default null
10617           */
10618          "sDom": null,
10619          
10620          /**
10621           * Which type of pagination should be used.
10622           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10623           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10624           *  @type string 
10625           *  @default two_button
10626           */
10627          "sPaginationType": "two_button",
10628          
10629          /**
10630           * The cookie duration (for bStateSave) in seconds.
10631           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10632           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10633           *  @type int
10634           *  @default 0
10635           */
10636          "iCookieDuration": 0,
10637          
10638          /**
10639           * The cookie name prefix.
10640           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10641           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10642           *  @type string
10643           *  @default <i>Empty string</i>
10644           */
10645          "sCookiePrefix": "",
10646          
10647          /**
10648           * Callback function for cookie creation.
10649           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10650           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10651           *  @type function
10652           *  @default null
10653           */
10654          "fnCookieCallback": null,
10655          
10656          /**
10657           * Array of callback functions for state saving. Each array element is an 
10658           * object with the following parameters:
10659           *   <ul>
10660           *     <li>function:fn - function to call. Takes two parameters, oSettings
10661           *       and the JSON string to save that has been thus far created. Returns
10662           *       a JSON string to be inserted into a json object 
10663           *       (i.e. '"param": [ 0, 1, 2]')</li>
10664           *     <li>string:sName - name of callback</li>
10665           *   </ul>
10666           *  @type array
10667           *  @default []
10668           */
10669          "aoStateSave": [],
10670          
10671          /**
10672           * Array of callback functions for state loading. Each array element is an 
10673           * object with the following parameters:
10674           *   <ul>
10675           *     <li>function:fn - function to call. Takes two parameters, oSettings 
10676           *       and the object stored. May return false to cancel state loading</li>
10677           *     <li>string:sName - name of callback</li>
10678           *   </ul>
10679           *  @type array
10680           *  @default []
10681           */
10682          "aoStateLoad": [],
10683          
10684          /**
10685           * State that was loaded from the cookie. Useful for back reference
10686           *  @type object
10687           *  @default null
10688           */
10689          "oLoadedState": null,
10690          
10691          /**
10692           * Source url for AJAX data for the table.
10693           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10694           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10695           *  @type string
10696           *  @default null
10697           */
10698          "sAjaxSource": null,
10699          
10700          /**
10701           * Property from a given object from which to read the table data from. This
10702           * can be an empty string (when not server-side processing), in which case 
10703           * it is  assumed an an array is given directly.
10704           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10705           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10706           *  @type string
10707           */
10708          "sAjaxDataProp": null,
10709          
10710          /**
10711           * Note if draw should be blocked while getting data
10712           *  @type boolean
10713           *  @default true
10714           */
10715          "bAjaxDataGet": true,
10716          
10717          /**
10718           * The last jQuery XHR object that was used for server-side data gathering. 
10719           * This can be used for working with the XHR information in one of the 
10720           * callbacks
10721           *  @type object
10722           *  @default null
10723           */
10724          "jqXHR": null,
10725          
10726          /**
10727           * Function to get the server-side data.
10728           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10729           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10730           *  @type function
10731           */
10732          "fnServerData": null,
10733          
10734          /**
10735           * Functions which are called prior to sending an Ajax request so extra 
10736           * parameters can easily be sent to the server
10737           *  @type array
10738           *  @default []
10739           */
10740          "aoServerParams": [],
10741          
10742          /**
10743           * Send the XHR HTTP method - GET or POST (could be PUT or DELETE if 
10744           * required).
10745           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10746           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10747           *  @type string
10748           */
10749          "sServerMethod": null,
10750          
10751          /**
10752           * Format numbers for display.
10753           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10754           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10755           *  @type function
10756           */
10757          "fnFormatNumber": null,
10758          
10759          /**
10760           * List of options that can be used for the user selectable length menu.
10761           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10762           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10763           *  @type array
10764           *  @default []
10765           */
10766          "aLengthMenu": null,
10767          
10768          /**
10769           * Counter for the draws that the table does. Also used as a tracker for
10770           * server-side processing
10771           *  @type int
10772           *  @default 0
10773           */
10774          "iDraw": 0,
10775          
10776          /**
10777           * Indicate if a redraw is being done - useful for Ajax
10778           *  @type boolean
10779           *  @default false
10780           */
10781          "bDrawing": false,
10782          
10783          /**
10784           * Draw index (iDraw) of the last error when parsing the returned data
10785           *  @type int
10786           *  @default -1
10787           */
10788          "iDrawError": -1,
10789          
10790          /**
10791           * Paging display length
10792           *  @type int
10793           *  @default 10
10794           */
10795          "_iDisplayLength": 10,
10796      
10797          /**
10798           * Paging start point - aiDisplay index
10799           *  @type int
10800           *  @default 0
10801           */
10802          "_iDisplayStart": 0,
10803      
10804          /**
10805           * Paging end point - aiDisplay index. Use fnDisplayEnd rather than
10806           * this property to get the end point
10807           *  @type int
10808           *  @default 10
10809           *  @private
10810           */
10811          "_iDisplayEnd": 10,
10812          
10813          /**
10814           * Server-side processing - number of records in the result set
10815           * (i.e. before filtering), Use fnRecordsTotal rather than
10816           * this property to get the value of the number of records, regardless of
10817           * the server-side processing setting.
10818           *  @type int
10819           *  @default 0
10820           *  @private
10821           */
10822          "_iRecordsTotal": 0,
10823      
10824          /**
10825           * Server-side processing - number of records in the current display set
10826           * (i.e. after filtering). Use fnRecordsDisplay rather than
10827           * this property to get the value of the number of records, regardless of
10828           * the server-side processing setting.
10829           *  @type boolean
10830           *  @default 0
10831           *  @private
10832           */
10833          "_iRecordsDisplay": 0,
10834          
10835          /**
10836           * Flag to indicate if jQuery UI marking and classes should be used.
10837           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10838           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10839           *  @type boolean
10840           */
10841          "bJUI": null,
10842          
10843          /**
10844           * The classes to use for the table
10845           *  @type object
10846           *  @default {}
10847           */
10848          "oClasses": {},
10849          
10850          /**
10851           * Flag attached to the settings object so you can check in the draw 
10852           * callback if filtering has been done in the draw. Deprecated in favour of
10853           * events.
10854           *  @type boolean
10855           *  @default false
10856           *  @deprecated
10857           */
10858          "bFiltered": false,
10859          
10860          /**
10861           * Flag attached to the settings object so you can check in the draw 
10862           * callback if sorting has been done in the draw. Deprecated in favour of
10863           * events.
10864           *  @type boolean
10865           *  @default false
10866           *  @deprecated
10867           */
10868          "bSorted": false,
10869          
10870          /**
10871           * Indicate that if multiple rows are in the header and there is more than 
10872           * one unique cell per column, if the top one (true) or bottom one (false) 
10873           * should be used for sorting / title by DataTables.
10874           * Note that this parameter will be set by the initialisation routine. To
10875           * set a default use {@link DataTable.defaults}.
10876           *  @type boolean
10877           */
10878          "bSortCellsTop": null,
10879          
10880          /**
10881           * Initialisation object that is used for the table
10882           *  @type object
10883           *  @default null
10884           */
10885          "oInit": null,
10886          
10887          /**
10888           * Destroy callback functions - for plug-ins to attach themselves to the
10889           * destroy so they can clean up markup and events.
10890           *  @type array
10891           *  @default []
10892           */
10893          "aoDestroyCallback": [],
10894      
10895          
10896          /**
10897           * Get the number of records in the current record set, before filtering
10898           *  @type function
10899           */
10900          "fnRecordsTotal": function ()
10901          {
10902              if ( this.oFeatures.bServerSide ) {
10903                  return parseInt(this._iRecordsTotal, 10);
10904              } else {
10905                  return this.aiDisplayMaster.length;
10906              }
10907          },
10908          
10909          /**
10910           * Get the number of records in the current record set, after filtering
10911           *  @type function
10912           */
10913          "fnRecordsDisplay": function ()
10914          {
10915              if ( this.oFeatures.bServerSide ) {
10916                  return parseInt(this._iRecordsDisplay, 10);
10917              } else {
10918                  return this.aiDisplay.length;
10919              }
10920          },
10921          
10922          /**
10923           * Set the display end point - aiDisplay index
10924           *  @type function
10925           *  @todo Should do away with _iDisplayEnd and calculate it on-the-fly here
10926           */
10927          "fnDisplayEnd": function ()
10928          {
10929              if ( this.oFeatures.bServerSide ) {
10930                  if ( this.oFeatures.bPaginate === false || this._iDisplayLength == -1 ) {
10931                      return this._iDisplayStart+this.aiDisplay.length;
10932                  } else {
10933                      return Math.min( this._iDisplayStart+this._iDisplayLength, 
10934                          this._iRecordsDisplay );
10935                  }
10936              } else {
10937                  return this._iDisplayEnd;
10938              }
10939          },
10940          
10941          /**
10942           * The DataTables object for this table
10943           *  @type object
10944           *  @default null
10945           */
10946          "oInstance": null,
10947          
10948          /**
10949           * Unique identifier for each instance of the DataTables object. If there
10950           * is an ID on the table node, then it takes that value, otherwise an
10951           * incrementing internal counter is used.
10952           *  @type string
10953           *  @default null
10954           */
10955          "sInstance": null,
10956      
10957          /**
10958           * tabindex attribute value that is added to DataTables control elements, allowing
10959           * keyboard navigation of the table and its controls.
10960           */
10961          "iTabIndex": 0
10962      };
10963  
10964      /**
10965       * Extension object for DataTables that is used to provide all extension options.
10966       * 
10967       * Note that the <i>DataTable.ext</i> object is available through
10968       * <i>jQuery.fn.dataTable.ext</i> where it may be accessed and manipulated. It is
10969       * also aliased to <i>jQuery.fn.dataTableExt</i> for historic reasons.
10970       *  @namespace
10971       *  @extends DataTable.models.ext
10972       */
10973      DataTable.ext = $.extend( true, {}, DataTable.models.ext );
10974      
10975      $.extend( DataTable.ext.oStdClasses, {
10976          "sTable": "dataTable",
10977      
10978          /* Two buttons buttons */
10979          "sPagePrevEnabled": "paginate_enabled_previous",
10980          "sPagePrevDisabled": "paginate_disabled_previous",
10981          "sPageNextEnabled": "paginate_enabled_next",
10982          "sPageNextDisabled": "paginate_disabled_next",
10983          "sPageJUINext": "",
10984          "sPageJUIPrev": "",
10985          
10986          /* Full numbers paging buttons */
10987          "sPageButton": "paginate_button",
10988          "sPageButtonActive": "paginate_active",
10989          "sPageButtonStaticDisabled": "paginate_button paginate_button_disabled",
10990          "sPageFirst": "first",
10991          "sPagePrevious": "previous",
10992          "sPageNext": "next",
10993          "sPageLast": "last",
10994          
10995          /* Striping classes */
10996          "sStripeOdd": "odd",
10997          "sStripeEven": "even",
10998          
10999          /* Empty row */
11000          "sRowEmpty": "dataTables_empty",
11001          
11002          /* Features */
11003          "sWrapper": "dataTables_wrapper",
11004          "sFilter": "dataTables_filter",
11005          "sInfo": "dataTables_info",
11006          "sPaging": "dataTables_paginate paging_", /* Note that the type is postfixed */
11007          "sLength": "dataTables_length",
11008          "sProcessing": "dataTables_processing",
11009          
11010          /* Sorting */
11011          "sSortAsc": "sorting_asc",
11012          "sSortDesc": "sorting_desc",
11013          "sSortable": "sorting", /* Sortable in both directions */
11014          "sSortableAsc": "sorting_asc_disabled",
11015          "sSortableDesc": "sorting_desc_disabled",
11016          "sSortableNone": "sorting_disabled",
11017          "sSortColumn": "sorting_", /* Note that an int is postfixed for the sorting order */
11018          "sSortJUIAsc": "",
11019          "sSortJUIDesc": "",
11020          "sSortJUI": "",
11021          "sSortJUIAscAllowed": "",
11022          "sSortJUIDescAllowed": "",
11023          "sSortJUIWrapper": "",
11024          "sSortIcon": "",
11025          
11026          /* Scrolling */
11027          "sScrollWrapper": "dataTables_scroll",
11028          "sScrollHead": "dataTables_scrollHead",
11029          "sScrollHeadInner": "dataTables_scrollHeadInner",
11030          "sScrollBody": "dataTables_scrollBody",
11031          "sScrollFoot": "dataTables_scrollFoot",
11032          "sScrollFootInner": "dataTables_scrollFootInner",
11033          
11034          /* Misc */
11035          "sFooterTH": ""
11036      } );
11037      
11038      
11039      $.extend( DataTable.ext.oJUIClasses, DataTable.ext.oStdClasses, {
11040          /* Two buttons buttons */
11041          "sPagePrevEnabled": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-left",
11042          "sPagePrevDisabled": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-left ui-state-disabled",
11043          "sPageNextEnabled": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-right",
11044          "sPageNextDisabled": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-corner-right ui-state-disabled",
11045          "sPageJUINext": "ui-icon ui-icon-circle-arrow-e",
11046          "sPageJUIPrev": "ui-icon ui-icon-circle-arrow-w",
11047          
11048          /* Full numbers paging buttons */
11049          "sPageButton": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default",
11050          "sPageButtonActive": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-state-disabled",
11051          "sPageButtonStaticDisabled": "fg-button ui-button ui-state-default ui-state-disabled",
11052          "sPageFirst": "first ui-corner-tl ui-corner-bl",
11053          "sPageLast": "last ui-corner-tr ui-corner-br",
11054          
11055          /* Features */
11056          "sPaging": "dataTables_paginate fg-buttonset ui-buttonset fg-buttonset-multi "+
11057              "ui-buttonset-multi paging_", /* Note that the type is postfixed */
11058          
11059          /* Sorting */
11060          "sSortAsc": "ui-state-default",
11061          "sSortDesc": "ui-state-default",
11062          "sSortable": "ui-state-default",
11063          "sSortableAsc": "ui-state-default",
11064          "sSortableDesc": "ui-state-default",
11065          "sSortableNone": "ui-state-default",
11066          "sSortJUIAsc": "css_right ui-icon ui-icon-triangle-1-n",
11067          "sSortJUIDesc": "css_right ui-icon ui-icon-triangle-1-s",
11068          "sSortJUI": "css_right ui-icon ui-icon-carat-2-n-s",
11069          "sSortJUIAscAllowed": "css_right ui-icon ui-icon-carat-1-n",
11070          "sSortJUIDescAllowed": "css_right ui-icon ui-icon-carat-1-s",
11071          "sSortJUIWrapper": "DataTables_sort_wrapper",
11072          "sSortIcon": "DataTables_sort_icon",
11073          
11074          /* Scrolling */
11075          "sScrollHead": "dataTables_scrollHead ui-state-default",
11076          "sScrollFoot": "dataTables_scrollFoot ui-state-default",
11077          
11078          /* Misc */
11079          "sFooterTH": "ui-state-default"
11080      } );
11081      
11082      
11083      /*
11084       * Variable: oPagination
11085       * Purpose:  
11086       * Scope:    jQuery.fn.dataTableExt
11087       */
11088      $.extend( DataTable.ext.oPagination, {
11089          /*
11090           * Variable: two_button
11091           * Purpose:  Standard two button (forward/back) pagination
11092           * Scope:    jQuery.fn.dataTableExt.oPagination
11093           */
11094          "two_button": {
11095              /*
11096               * Function: oPagination.two_button.fnInit
11097               * Purpose:  Initialise dom elements required for pagination with forward/back buttons only
11098               * Returns:  -
11099               * Inputs:   object:oSettings - dataTables settings object
11100               *           node:nPaging - the DIV which contains this pagination control
11101               *           function:fnCallbackDraw - draw function which must be called on update
11102               */
11103              "fnInit": function ( oSettings, nPaging, fnCallbackDraw )
11104              {
11105                  var oLang = oSettings.oLanguage.oPaginate;
11106                  var oClasses = oSettings.oClasses;
11107                  var fnClickHandler = function ( e ) {
11108                      if ( oSettings.oApi._fnPageChange( oSettings, e.data.action ) )
11109                      {
11110                          fnCallbackDraw( oSettings );
11111                      }
11112                  };
11113      
11114                  var sAppend = (!oSettings.bJUI) ?
11115                      '<a class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPagePrevDisabled+'" tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" role="button">'+oLang.sPrevious+'</a>'+
11116                      '<a class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPageNextDisabled+'" tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" role="button">'+oLang.sNext+'</a>'
11117                      :
11118                      '<a class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPagePrevDisabled+'" tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" role="button"><span class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPageJUIPrev+'"></span></a>'+
11119                      '<a class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPageNextDisabled+'" tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" role="button"><span class="'+oSettings.oClasses.sPageJUINext+'"></span></a>';
11120                  $(nPaging).append( sAppend );
11121                  
11122                  var els = $('a', nPaging);
11123                  var nPrevious = els[0],
11124                      nNext = els[1];
11125                  
11126                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nPrevious, {action: "previous"}, fnClickHandler );
11127                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nNext,     {action: "next"},     fnClickHandler );
11128                  
11129                  /* ID the first elements only */
11130                  if ( !oSettings.aanFeatures.p )
11131                  {
11132                      nPaging.id = oSettings.sTableId+'_paginate';
11133                      nPrevious.id = oSettings.sTableId+'_previous';
11134                      nNext.id = oSettings.sTableId+'_next';
11135      
11136                      nPrevious.setAttribute('aria-controls', oSettings.sTableId);
11137                      nNext.setAttribute('aria-controls', oSettings.sTableId);
11138                  }
11139              },
11140              
11141              /*
11142               * Function: oPagination.two_button.fnUpdate
11143               * Purpose:  Update the two button pagination at the end of the draw
11144               * Returns:  -
11145               * Inputs:   object:oSettings - dataTables settings object
11146               *           function:fnCallbackDraw - draw function to call on page change
11147               */
11148              "fnUpdate": function ( oSettings, fnCallbackDraw )
11149              {
11150                  if ( !oSettings.aanFeatures.p )
11151                  {
11152                      return;
11153                  }
11154                  
11155                  var oClasses = oSettings.oClasses;
11156                  var an = oSettings.aanFeatures.p;
11157      
11158                  /* Loop over each instance of the pager */
11159                  for ( var i=0, iLen=an.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
11160                  {
11161                      if ( an[i].childNodes.length !== 0 )
11162                      {
11163                          an[i].childNodes[0].className = ( oSettings._iDisplayStart === 0 ) ? 
11164                              oClasses.sPagePrevDisabled : oClasses.sPagePrevEnabled;
11165                          
11166                          an[i].childNodes[1].className = ( oSettings.fnDisplayEnd() == oSettings.fnRecordsDisplay() ) ? 
11167                              oClasses.sPageNextDisabled : oClasses.sPageNextEnabled;
11168                      }
11169                  }
11170              }
11171          },
11172          
11173          
11174          /*
11175           * Variable: iFullNumbersShowPages
11176           * Purpose:  Change the number of pages which can be seen
11177           * Scope:    jQuery.fn.dataTableExt.oPagination
11178           */
11179          "iFullNumbersShowPages": 5,
11180          
11181          /*
11182           * Variable: full_numbers
11183           * Purpose:  Full numbers pagination
11184           * Scope:    jQuery.fn.dataTableExt.oPagination
11185           */
11186          "full_numbers": {
11187              /*
11188               * Function: oPagination.full_numbers.fnInit
11189               * Purpose:  Initialise dom elements required for pagination with a list of the pages
11190               * Returns:  -
11191               * Inputs:   object:oSettings - dataTables settings object
11192               *           node:nPaging - the DIV which contains this pagination control
11193               *           function:fnCallbackDraw - draw function which must be called on update
11194               */
11195              "fnInit": function ( oSettings, nPaging, fnCallbackDraw )
11196              {
11197                  var oLang = oSettings.oLanguage.oPaginate;
11198                  var oClasses = oSettings.oClasses;
11199                  var fnClickHandler = function ( e ) {
11200                      if ( oSettings.oApi._fnPageChange( oSettings, e.data.action ) )
11201                      {
11202                          fnCallbackDraw( oSettings );
11203                      }
11204                  };
11205      
11206                  $(nPaging).append(
11207                      '<a  tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButton+" "+oClasses.sPageFirst+'">'+oLang.sFirst+'</a>'+
11208                      '<a  tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButton+" "+oClasses.sPagePrevious+'">'+oLang.sPrevious+'</a>'+
11209                      '<span></span>'+
11210                      '<a tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButton+" "+oClasses.sPageNext+'">'+oLang.sNext+'</a>'+
11211                      '<a tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButton+" "+oClasses.sPageLast+'">'+oLang.sLast+'</a>'
11212                  );
11213                  var els = $('a', nPaging);
11214                  var nFirst = els[0],
11215                      nPrev = els[1],
11216                      nNext = els[2],
11217                      nLast = els[3];
11218                  
11219                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nFirst, {action: "first"},    fnClickHandler );
11220                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nPrev,  {action: "previous"}, fnClickHandler );
11221                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nNext,  {action: "next"},     fnClickHandler );
11222                  oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( nLast,  {action: "last"},     fnClickHandler );
11223                  
11224                  /* ID the first elements only */
11225                  if ( !oSettings.aanFeatures.p )
11226                  {
11227                      nPaging.id = oSettings.sTableId+'_paginate';
11228                      nFirst.id =oSettings.sTableId+'_first';
11229                      nPrev.id =oSettings.sTableId+'_previous';
11230                      nNext.id =oSettings.sTableId+'_next';
11231                      nLast.id =oSettings.sTableId+'_last';
11232                  }
11233              },
11234              
11235              /*
11236               * Function: oPagination.full_numbers.fnUpdate
11237               * Purpose:  Update the list of page buttons shows
11238               * Returns:  -
11239               * Inputs:   object:oSettings - dataTables settings object
11240               *           function:fnCallbackDraw - draw function to call on page change
11241               */
11242              "fnUpdate": function ( oSettings, fnCallbackDraw )
11243              {
11244                  if ( !oSettings.aanFeatures.p )
11245                  {
11246                      return;
11247                  }
11248                  
11249                  var iPageCount = DataTable.ext.oPagination.iFullNumbersShowPages;
11250                  var iPageCountHalf = Math.floor(iPageCount / 2);
11251                  var iPages = Math.ceil((oSettings.fnRecordsDisplay()) / oSettings._iDisplayLength);
11252                  var iCurrentPage = Math.ceil(oSettings._iDisplayStart / oSettings._iDisplayLength) + 1;
11253                  var sList = "";
11254                  var iStartButton, iEndButton, i, iLen;
11255                  var oClasses = oSettings.oClasses;
11256                  var anButtons, anStatic, nPaginateList;
11257                  var an = oSettings.aanFeatures.p;
11258                  var fnBind = function (j) {
11259                      oSettings.oApi._fnBindAction( this, {"page": j+iStartButton-1}, function(e) {
11260                          /* Use the information in the element to jump to the required page */
11261                          oSettings.oApi._fnPageChange( oSettings, e.data.page );
11262                          fnCallbackDraw( oSettings );
11263                          e.preventDefault();
11264                      } );
11265                  };
11266                  
11267                  /* Pages calculation */
11268                  if (iPages < iPageCount)
11269                  {
11270                      iStartButton = 1;
11271                      iEndButton = iPages;
11272                  }
11273                  else if (iCurrentPage <= iPageCountHalf)
11274                  {
11275                      iStartButton = 1;
11276                      iEndButton = iPageCount;
11277                  }
11278                  else if (iCurrentPage >= (iPages - iPageCountHalf))
11279                  {
11280                      iStartButton = iPages - iPageCount + 1;
11281                      iEndButton = iPages;
11282                  }
11283                  else
11284                  {
11285                      iStartButton = iCurrentPage - Math.ceil(iPageCount / 2) + 1;
11286                      iEndButton = iStartButton + iPageCount - 1;
11287                  }
11288                  
11289                  /* Build the dynamic list */
11290                  for ( i=iStartButton ; i<=iEndButton ; i++ )
11291                  {
11292                      sList += (iCurrentPage !== i) ?
11293                          '<a tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButton+'">'+oSettings.fnFormatNumber(i)+'</a>' :
11294                          '<a tabindex="'+oSettings.iTabIndex+'" class="'+oClasses.sPageButtonActive+'">'+oSettings.fnFormatNumber(i)+'</a>';
11295                  }
11296                  
11297                  /* Loop over each instance of the pager */
11298                  for ( i=0, iLen=an.length ; i<iLen ; i++ )
11299                  {
11300                      if ( an[i].childNodes.length === 0 )
11301                      {
11302                          continue;
11303                      }
11304                      
11305                      /* Build up the dynamic list forst - html and listeners */
11306                      $('span:eq(0)', an[i])
11307                          .html( sList )
11308                          .children('a').each( fnBind );
11309                      
11310                      /* Update the premanent botton's classes */
11311                      anButtons = an[i].getElementsByTagName('a');
11312                      anStatic = [
11313                          anButtons[0], anButtons[1], 
11314                          anButtons[anButtons.length-2], anButtons[anButtons.length-1]
11315                      ];
11316      
11317                      $(anStatic).removeClass( oClasses.sPageButton+" "+oClasses.sPageButtonActive+" "+oClasses.sPageButtonStaticDisabled );
11318                      $([anStatic[0], anStatic[1]]).addClass( 
11319                          (iCurrentPage==1) ?
11320                              oClasses.sPageButtonStaticDisabled :
11321                              oClasses.sPageButton
11322                      );
11323                      $([anStatic[2], anStatic[3]]).addClass(
11324                          (iPages===0 || iCurrentPage===iPages || oSettings._iDisplayLength===-1) ?
11325                              oClasses.sPageButtonStaticDisabled :
11326                              oClasses.sPageButton
11327                      );
11328                  }
11329              }
11330          }
11331      } );
11332      
11333      $.extend( DataTable.ext.oSort, {
11334          /*
11335           * text sorting
11336           */
11337          "string-pre": function ( a )
11338          {
11339              if ( typeof a != 'string' ) { a = ''; }
11340              return a.toLowerCase();
11341          },
11342      
11343          "string-asc": function ( x, y )
11344          {
11345              return ((x < y) ? -1 : ((x > y) ? 1 : 0));
11346          },
11347          
11348          "string-desc": function ( x, y )
11349          {
11350              return ((x < y) ? 1 : ((x > y) ? -1 : 0));
11351          },
11352          
11353          
11354          /*
11355           * html sorting (ignore html tags)
11356           */
11357          "html-pre": function ( a )
11358          {
11359              return a.replace( /<.*?>/g, "" ).toLowerCase();
11360          },
11361          
11362          "html-asc": function ( x, y )
11363          {
11364              return ((x < y) ? -1 : ((x > y) ? 1 : 0));
11365          },
11366          
11367          "html-desc": function ( x, y )
11368          {
11369              return ((x < y) ? 1 : ((x > y) ? -1 : 0));
11370          },
11371          
11372          
11373          /*
11374           * date sorting
11375           */
11376          "date-pre": function ( a )
11377          {
11378              var x = Date.parse( a );
11379              
11380              if ( isNaN(x) || x==="" )
11381              {
11382                  x = Date.parse( "01/01/1970 00:00:00" );
11383              }
11384              return x;
11385          },
11386      
11387          "date-asc": function ( x, y )
11388          {
11389              return x - y;
11390          },
11391          
11392          "date-desc": function ( x, y )
11393          {
11394              return y - x;
11395          },
11396          
11397          
11398          /*
11399           * numerical sorting
11400           */
11401          "numeric-pre": function ( a )
11402          {
11403              return (a=="-" || a==="") ? 0 : a*1;
11404          },
11405      
11406          "numeric-asc": function ( x, y )
11407          {
11408              return x - y;
11409          },
11410          
11411          "numeric-desc": function ( x, y )
11412          {
11413              return y - x;
11414          }
11415      } );
11416      
11417      
11418      $.extend( DataTable.ext.aTypes, [
11419          /*
11420           * Function: -
11421           * Purpose:  Check to see if a string is numeric
11422           * Returns:  string:'numeric' or null
11423           * Inputs:   mixed:sText - string to check
11424           */
11425          function ( sData )
11426          {
11427              /* Allow zero length strings as a number */
11428              if ( typeof sData === 'number' )
11429              {
11430                  return 'numeric';
11431              }
11432              else if ( typeof sData !== 'string' )
11433              {
11434                  return null;
11435              }
11436              
11437              var sValidFirstChars = "0123456789-";
11438              var sValidChars = "0123456789.";
11439              var Char;
11440              var bDecimal = false;
11441              
11442              /* Check for a valid first char (no period and allow negatives) */
11443              Char = sData.charAt(0); 
11444              if (sValidFirstChars.indexOf(Char) == -1) 
11445              {
11446                  return null;
11447              }
11448              
11449              /* Check all the other characters are valid */
11450              for ( var i=1 ; i<sData.length ; i++ ) 
11451              {
11452                  Char = sData.charAt(i); 
11453                  if (sValidChars.indexOf(Char) == -1) 
11454                  {
11455                      return null;
11456                  }
11457                  
11458                  /* Only allowed one decimal place... */
11459                  if ( Char == "." )
11460                  {
11461                      if ( bDecimal )
11462                      {
11463                          return null;
11464                      }
11465                      bDecimal = true;
11466                  }
11467              }
11468              
11469              return 'numeric';
11470          },
11471          
11472          /*
11473           * Function: -
11474           * Purpose:  Check to see if a string is actually a formatted date
11475           * Returns:  string:'date' or null
11476           * Inputs:   string:sText - string to check
11477           */
11478          function ( sData )
11479          {
11480              var iParse = Date.parse(sData);
11481              if ( (iParse !== null && !isNaN(iParse)) || (typeof sData === 'string' && sData.length === 0) )
11482              {
11483                  return 'date';
11484              }
11485              return null;
11486          },
11487          
11488          /*
11489           * Function: -
11490           * Purpose:  Check to see if a string should be treated as an HTML string
11491           * Returns:  string:'html' or null
11492           * Inputs:   string:sText - string to check
11493           */
11494          function ( sData )
11495          {
11496              if ( typeof sData === 'string' && sData.indexOf('<') != -1 && sData.indexOf('>') != -1 )
11497              {
11498                  return 'html';
11499              }
11500              return null;
11501          }
11502      ] );
11503      
11504  
11505      // jQuery aliases
11506      $.fn.DataTable = DataTable;
11507      $.fn.dataTable = DataTable;
11508      $.fn.dataTableSettings = DataTable.settings;
11509      $.fn.dataTableExt = DataTable.ext;
11510  
11511  
11512      // Information about events fired by DataTables - for documentation.
11513      /**
11514       * Draw event, fired whenever the table is redrawn on the page, at the same point as
11515       * fnDrawCallback. This may be useful for binding events or performing calculations when
11516       * the table is altered at all.
11517       *  @name DataTable#draw
11518       *  @event
11519       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11520       *  @param {object} o DataTables settings object {@link DataTable.models.oSettings}
11521       */
11522  
11523      /**
11524       * Filter event, fired when the filtering applied to the table (using the build in global
11525       * global filter, or column filters) is altered.
11526       *  @name DataTable#filter
11527       *  @event
11528       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11529       *  @param {object} o DataTables settings object {@link DataTable.models.oSettings}
11530       */
11531  
11532      /**
11533       * Page change event, fired when the paging of the table is altered.
11534       *  @name DataTable#page
11535       *  @event
11536       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11537       *  @param {object} o DataTables settings object {@link DataTable.models.oSettings}
11538       */
11539  
11540      /**
11541       * Sort event, fired when the sorting applied to the table is altered.
11542       *  @name DataTable#sort
11543       *  @event
11544       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11545       *  @param {object} o DataTables settings object {@link DataTable.models.oSettings}
11546       */
11547  
11548      /**
11549       * DataTables initialisation complete event, fired when the table is fully drawn,
11550       * including Ajax data loaded, if Ajax data is required.
11551       *  @name DataTable#init
11552       *  @event
11553       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11554       *  @param {object} oSettings DataTables settings object
11555       *  @param {object} json The JSON object request from the server - only
11556       *    present if client-side Ajax sourced data is used</li></ol>
11557       */
11558  
11559      /**
11560       * State save event, fired when the table has changed state a new state save is required.
11561       * This method allows modification of the state saving object prior to actually doing the
11562       * save, including addition or other state properties (for plug-ins) or modification
11563       * of a DataTables core property.
11564       *  @name DataTable#stateSaveParams
11565       *  @event
11566       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11567       *  @param {object} oSettings DataTables settings object
11568       *  @param {object} json The state information to be saved
11569       */
11570  
11571      /**
11572       * State load event, fired when the table is loading state from the stored data, but
11573       * prior to the settings object being modified by the saved state - allowing modification
11574       * of the saved state is required or loading of state for a plug-in.
11575       *  @name DataTable#stateLoadParams
11576       *  @event
11577       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11578       *  @param {object} oSettings DataTables settings object
11579       *  @param {object} json The saved state information
11580       */
11581  
11582      /**
11583       * State loaded event, fired when state has been loaded from stored data and the settings
11584       * object has been modified by the loaded data.
11585       *  @name DataTable#stateLoaded
11586       *  @event
11587       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11588       *  @param {object} oSettings DataTables settings object
11589       *  @param {object} json The saved state information
11590       */
11591  
11592      /**
11593       * Processing event, fired when DataTables is doing some kind of processing (be it,
11594       * sort, filter or anything else). Can be used to indicate to the end user that
11595       * there is something happening, or that something has finished.
11596       *  @name DataTable#processing
11597       *  @event
11598       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11599       *  @param {object} oSettings DataTables settings object
11600       *  @param {boolean} bShow Flag for if DataTables is doing processing or not
11601       */
11602  
11603      /**
11604       * Ajax (XHR) event, fired whenever an Ajax request is completed from a request to 
11605       * made to the server for new data (note that this trigger is called in fnServerData,
11606       * if you override fnServerData and which to use this event, you need to trigger it in
11607       * you success function).
11608       *  @name DataTable#xhr
11609       *  @event
11610       *  @param {event} e jQuery event object
11611       *  @param {object} o DataTables settings object {@link DataTable.models.oSettings}
11612       */
11613  }(jQuery, window, document, undefined));
